ygData.subject: RE: Crested Spaulders/ Jagged Band
ygData.msgSnippet: i myself prefer the bloodstained mantle for the magic resist... though the ac is abit lower. As for the Jagged band, you really didnt pay much for it there.
ygData.messageBody:
i myself prefer the bloodstained mantle for the magic resist... though the
ac is abit lower. As for the Jagged band, you really didnt pay much for it
there. I've bought 2 for 225 and sold em for 250pp each jagged band on
Solusek Ro

Just thought i'd give ya a heads up on the ring

Minkin Nehoc
Solusek Ro
Bard of the 30th Chorus

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Sean Gifford [SMTP:Giffords@...]
> Sent: August 20, 1999 3:40 AM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: [eqbards] Crested Spaulders
>
> Yesterday, as I was about to Log off for the night A level 2 Enchanter was
> offering 30pp for a Sow at the Qeynos Gates. I gave him a tell and was
> offered 100pp to take him from Qeynos to Rivervale to be twinked there by
> his level 50 char :). Of course I accepted the offer and we ran down to
> Rivervale, in the end he died once and had to take the boat back across
> the Ocean from Erudin but eventually we got there safely and I was 100pp
> richer.
> Today, as a further reward for my services the player logged on as his
> level 50 cleric and asked me to meet him at the Freeport Bank. When I
> arrived he gave me the following for my help previously: A pair of Bronze
> Bracers, Elf Hide Gloves, Crested Spaulders. I promptly thanked him and
> he left saying thanks. As he was leaving a level 50 warrior in the bank
> was selling a Jagged Band for 50pp, so I telled him and purchased my new
> peice of jewelery immediately. I then sold my old Amber ring, the 2
> bronze bracers (too heavy for their ac), and my old Rusty Spiked shoulders
> to a Bard friend of mine for 40pp. After that I met the Cleric again and
> he needed help buying spells for his Enchanter at the Caster Guild because
> everyone was dubious to him. I helped him there and once again thanked
> him for his earlier gifts. So now, I am wondering if The Crested
> Spaulders ac:11 +6sta are good for me to use, or maybe I can trade it for
> things like A pair of Golden Amber earrings, a Second Jagged band,
> Bloodstained Mantle, A runed Bone Fork etc. I am happy with my current
> Dual Weilding of a Barbed Leather whip and Dragoon dirk, so I think that
> Armor is the way to go.
> Any help in this subject would be wonderful.
>
> Gleeman, bard of the 18th song - Karana
> The luckiest Bard in Norrath.
